features: Features robust Cordura® on the sleeves to minimize the chance of rips or tears in a fall
Two rear pockets give plenty of space to store ride essentials and a smaller zipped pocket offers secure storage for valuables
Highly sun resistant material with UPF 50+ protection. Rain protection is also provided thanks to a waterproof membrane on the back
Reflective detailing including the POC logo is also included to help heighten rider visibility in difficult light
